content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code teenagedream50 for 50% off the original price or use the code teenagedream100 for a free copy if you download for free i d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️ thank you for your support introducing the teenage dream coaster a bold and modern crochet design that s both functional and stylish this coaster features a textured eye-catching base paired with a playful bobble edging and a ribbed border for extra depth and interest with its quick and easy construction it s the perfect project for beginners or anyone looking for a fast satisfying make whether you re crafting for yourself or creating gifts for loved ones the teenage dream coaster brings a unique flair to any space with minimal effort get ready to add a pop of texture and personality to your home this pattern is made in worsted weight yarn with a 4 5mm hook i think a synthetic or plant fiber is best for a coaster as you will want it to be easy care this coaster is worked in the round featuring the single and double_crochet stitch work increases every round incorporating textured elements by working into rounds below your current round you end with a decorative bobble edging with a ribbed border gauge is not crucial in such a small piece this pattern is written for one size which should be a perfect fit for most mugs if you find that it is too small/too large for your mug i encourage you to experiment with another gauge or the number of rounds this is a beginner friendly pattern it uses basic stitches and includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions there are also links to video tutorials for all the special techniques thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support thank you to my amazing testers signergirl1 /people/signergirl1 jooleej /people/jooleej dawnlambert88 /people/dawnlambert88 maylina /people/maylina
